# Merge dataframes

```{r}

# bind_cols()
# bind_rows()

gender_df <- merge(e2_df_rec, a10_df_rec)

df_discipline_a1 <- merge (e7_df_rec, a1_df_rec)

```

# Bivariate analysis Gender

```{r}
# try something


gender_df %>%
  select(E2, `A10[SQ001]`) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(E2, fill = `A10[SQ001]`)) +
  geom_bar(position = "dodge") +
  coord_flip() +
  labs(title = "Title")

gender_df %>%
  select(E2, `A10[SQ002]`) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(E2, fill = `A10[SQ002]`)) +
  geom_bar(position = "dodge") +
  coord_flip() +
  labs(title = "Title")

gender_df %>%
  select(E2, `A10[SQ001]`) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = E2, y = `A10[SQ001]`)) +
  geom_jitter() +
  labs(title = "Title")



```

# Analyse discipline

```{r}

# try ggplot


df_discipline_a1 %>%
  select(E7, `A1[SQ001]`) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(E7, fill = `A1[SQ001]`)) +
  geom_bar(position = "dodge") +
  labs(title = "Title")


df_discipline_a1 %>%
  select(E7, `A1[SQ001]`) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = E7, y = `A1[SQ001]`)) +
  geom_jitter() +
  labs(title = "Title")


df_discipline_a1 %>%
  count(E7, `A1[SQ001]`) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = E7, y = `A1[SQ001]`, fill = E7)) +
  geom_bar(stat = 'identity') +
  labs(title = "Title")

df_discipline_a1 %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = E7,
               y = `A1[SQ001]`,
               colour = E7,
               linetype = E7,
               group = E7)) + 
    geom_line(size = 2) + 
    geom_point(size = 4)



df_discipline_a1 %>%
  select(`A1[SQ001]`, E7) %>% 
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = `A1[SQ001]`, fill = E7)) + 
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.8, 
                   position = "dodge")

df_discipline_a1 %>%
select(E7, `A1[SQ001]`) %>% 
    ggplot(mapping = aes(x = E7)) +
    facet_grid(`A1[SQ001]`) + 
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.8,
                   fill = 'steelblue4')

```
